description:
Freedom to Transact, Freedom to Create.   
   
A visual ode to the pillars of vibrancy, innovation & growth.   
   
Liberating the mind and allowing creativity to flourish. Freeing the senses from constraints of scarcity, exploring new frontiers, reshaping the world using authentic artistic expression.   
   
Created in June 2023 using 176 cameras at the Xangle Studio with Kim Henry. Behind the scenes & bonus on https://ericpare.com/ftc   
   
Download Layers for ReMemeing:
